attributes.action: Cap Immoral profitering of Food and Power Corporations
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The ever increasing cost of food and fuel and power is making life very difficult for many millions of British people.

It is immoral for the key suppliers like Tescos, Asda, BR and Shell etc to be making billions of pounds profit per year. 

I call on the Primeminister to take action and protect the British consumer by capping the profits made on essential 'life critical' products.  before the stability of this nation suffers as a consequence

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
